channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Db2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Db2

item.title: CVE-2018-1936|2024-08-05T04:14:39.261Z -- ibm -- db2
item.description: IBM DB2 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 libdb2e.so.1 is vulnerable to a stack based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code. IBM X-Force ID: 153316.
